column5: Well its been just over a week since our newest arrival came and so far so good. Baby Nora was born on the Thursday of the Easter weekend and is doing really well. Our first daughter is now 2 and seems to be taking everything in stride and adjusting well.  Anyways I just thought I`d share.

Beautiful! You 2 year-old will be like a little mother, ours was like that with our son. She'll be very helpful and wanting to get involved. Let her, it will be a great experience for her and will make you both happy.
Congratulations on the addition of your next fishing partner!!! My two girls are 6 and 7 and can't wait to hit the water with daddy for some bassin'.
Nice fish.....oops I mean daughter. My niece's name is Nora. Beautiful name.   Congrats.
What a sweetie...congrats!!!  Great name too
Congratulations! Life as you know it will never be the same, it will only get better.
What a precious little child. Congratulations.
Thanks all, can`t wait to get them both out fishing. Our 2 year old just got her first fishing rod last week and I am planning to take her on the next nice day.
Congratulations on your new baby girl.
